title: Caving
short_description: Navigate dark limestone caves and discover ancient subterranean formations.
long_description:
Caving (Spelunking) is the exploration of natural cave systems. It is adventure in its purest, rawest form—crawling through narrow passages (squeezes), wading through underground rivers, and marveling at stalactites and stalagmites formed over millions of years.

Meghalaya is the caving capital of India, home to some of the longest and deepest caves in the world, like Krem Liat Prah. The Caving in the Abode of the Clouds Expedition (CACE) attracts international explorers annually. For tourists, accessible caves like Mawsmai offer a glimpse, while guided adventure tours take you deeper into the dark, wet limestone mazes of the Jaintia Hills.

locations.summary: The most accessible limestone cave for tourists, lit and safe.
Adventure caving: river passages, waist-deep water, and total darkness.
Second longest cave system in India, known for unique black limestone.
Huge magnificent caverns located 1400m above sea level.

opening_hours.time_notes: Entry usually closes an hour before sunset.

operating_season.off_season: Monsoon (June-Oct) - Caves in Meghalaya flood and are dangerous.
operating_season.season_notes: Dry season is essential for deep caving.

pricing_metadata.disclaimer: Adventure caving requires specialist guides and gear.

safety_guidelines: Never enter a non-tourist cave alone.
Carry at least 3 sources of light (Headlamp + Backup + Torch).
Watch out for loose rocks and slippery floors.
Bats are harmless; do not disturb them.
Be aware of water levels; unexpected rain can flood caves rapidly.
equipment_checklist: Coveralls (mechanic suit) to protect clothes from mud
major_experiences: TOTAL darkness (turn off lights to experience it)
Feeling prehistoric connection with the earth

sample_itinerary.one_day: Meghalaya: 8 AM drive to Sohra. 9 AM Gear up (boots, helmet). Enter Krem Mawmluh. 3 hours exploring river passage and fossil chambers. Exit muddy and happy. Lunch at local Cherrapunji stall.

booking_methods: Specialist Caving Tour Operators in Shillong
booking_details.how_to_reach: Guwahati is the nearest major airport/station for Meghalaya caves.

Unique 'Cave Pearls' and fossils found inside.
